entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
